channel.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Jeff Hester
channel.description: BigBlueBall, news, tips, tricks and support for all instant messengers.
channel.itunes:subtitle: BigBlueBall -- everything about instant messaging

image.title: BigBlueBall
image.description: Podcast about instant messaging, voice and webcam chat.

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #011
item.description: Messenger for Mac 6.0, Yahoo federation, Goodbye Leah, Google Talk open to all, Jajah's killer VOIP app, and the BigBlueBall Song

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #010
item.description: New Google Talk beta, Yahoo Messenger 8, Who am I and IM Etiquette

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #009
item.description: Yahoo Messenger outage outrage, Yahoo and WLM interoperability, Tworl, Gizmo free calls, AIM Pro and more

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #008
item.description: Adium 1.0 Beta, Yahoo! Messenger 4 beta for OS X, another AIM virus, BigBlueBall IRC and member forum highlights

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #007
item.description: AIM SDK 1.1, WLM goes gold, Yahoo Messenger 8 beta, eMessenger becomes eBuddy, and the future of IM

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #006
item.description: Windows Live Messenger and Yahoo! interoperability tests, WLM release next Friday, GoMeebo and Phishing for MySpace Users with AIM

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #005
item.description: Free PC-to-Phone Skype calls, Meebo, Doppelganger vs. imstar, AIM Triton 1.5 Preview and more

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #004
item.description: MySpaceIM, WLM open beta, Skype 2.5, AIM Pages, and Jeff uses the wrong mic

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #003
item.description: Sexual predators on IM, Yahoo closes Java chat, Google Talk update, WLM leaks and Win an iPod

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #002
item.description: Yahoo Calling, WLM open beta, Google Talk with Buddy Icons and Multi-network IM

item.title: BigBlueBall Instant Messaging #001
item.description: WLM update, Google Talk secrets and more.
